body:
Awesome man! Are we going to be able to deploy this? I'd love to have it as
part of my portfolio :). Hope things are well man.

On Thu, Oct 8, 2015 at 6:06 PM, Victor Atteh notifications@github.com
wrote:

Hey Alex! Yeah, everything is well here, hope all is well on your end too. I'm just trudging along, hoping to finish this in the next couple of days. Want to work on more of the discovery pages though. I hope to make this a portfolio piece too :)
